ygData.subject: Re: Sorry for more Whining But...
ygData.msgSnippet: I sent a message to Aurum of the EQVault about that very point might I suggest others follow suit.  It has become apparent alot of people are unaware of the
ygData.messageBody:
I sent a message to Aurum of the EQVault about that very point might I suggest others follow suit. It has become apparent alot of people are unaware of the burdens of bardhood. Maybe if more were aware of our situation the current status of ignore them and they'll keep playing will stop

On Tue, 8 Feb 2000 11:03:54 -0600 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
>
> Per www.eqvault.com Gordon made a large pot on the Sony Gameplay Forum
> where (among other things) he acknowledged the Damage Shield Stack bug -
> but not a single reference to the Invis or other Bard Song enhancements.
>
> I don't want to get into another cycle of rant/whine - but the least
> they could do is "come clean" and address this issue...
>
> Slyde
>
